item.title: API Reference Template
item.author: Jen-Chieh Shen
item.description: Demo: http://www.jcs-profile.com:3000/Manual/index.html GitHub Repo: https://github.com/jcs090218/API-Reference-Template Many of my works are about making API. I always have their trouble making API documents for myself and for people to read what each API does. To resolve this issue, I spent a few hours to design a small website that I could drop the HTML file in the target folder and it will show the file on the website. The following list is the list of technologies I used in the project.
